About me

My programming adventure started from february 2021 year. I learn new things quickly and try to do everything precisely. I improve my skills every day and I'm having a lot of fun with it. I'm very motivated to learn more and gain experience.

In my spare time from coding, I have been training in the gym for about 5 years. I am a calm, patient person who strives to achieve its goals.
